chapters.title: Prologue: Lightnings
chapters.info: Rhadam Asunawa, p. 44 (43)—High Inquisitor of the Hand of the Light. He wants every woman affiliated in any way with the White Tower hanged as of yesterday, every book that mentions Aes Sedai or the White Tower burned, and the very words banned. He would have Morgase hanged for her months in the Tower if Niall had let him.
